Thoughts For December 7, 2024

Finished Up My Website Pricing Tool

Earlier this week I finally finished putting together the code for the website pricing tool I'm working on. The code takes mulitple options and adds them up to give you an estimate of the website your planning on building. Now that I'm finished with the hard part I can focus on making the tools more engaging by improving the design by adding things like images and icons.

Improving My Website Local SEO Presence

Another thing I'm working on along with the other 10 projects I have is improving my websites local SEO presence. Ranking for local keywords is generally easy, the real question you have to ask yourself is whether you want to put in a lot of effort for keywords and phrases that might not have a lot of search volume.

Word I'm Trying To Rank For

Some of the Words I'm trying to rank for are keywords like "Website Designer in La Habra" and "Search Engine Optimzation in Fullerton".

Transfering Old Content & Drafts

Another SEO related tasks I managed to accomplish this week was moving over content I had written a year ago from a previous website to this one. While making the adjustments I was also learning how to add a sitemap to my 11ty website and Google accidentaly crawled the content that wasn't exactly ready to be published. The upside is I got some keywords information without really even trying.

Learning How To Use The Foreground Tool in GIMP

One of the more exciting things I did this week is learn how to use the foreground tool in GIMP. The reasons I spent a couple hours learning how to use this tool is because I've been trying to step my website design skills up learning how to better cut objects out of images is going to do just that.

Cutting Out Hair

Don't get me wrong I know the basics of croping obejcts but one thing that's really been bothering me is hair. Hair in images is always hard to isolate and crop around because of how frizzy and fine it is. This I've realized, has kept me from using people in my designs. I don't know if you know this but people seeing other people in images creates a better sense of trust in the visitor, shocking I now.

Ruben Gutierrez

Ruben Gutierrez is a website designer.
